snippet.title: This Halo VR Mod Evolves Combat Like Never Before - Halo VR Gameplay
snippet.description:
Don't miss this new Halo VR mod gameplay! Halo: Combat Evolved is now playable in VR, thanks to LivingFray, who's introduced Master Chief to the world of virtual reality in this Halo CE VR mod! While it's early days for this new VR mod, it's already packed with a bunch of refined VR specific features, and immersive virtual reality animations.

Want to check out this Halo mod for yourself? Here's a link: https://github.com/LivingFray/HaloCEVR

#Halo #Gaming #VR
